import React from 'react' import { useAuth } from "../context/auth"; import {Menu, Header} from 'antd' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const NavBar = () => { const { setAuthTokens, authTokens } = useAuth(); function logOut() { setAuthTokens(); } return (
Home {!authTokens ? <>
Login
: <> Logout }
) } export default NavBar
